mapper.select: SELECT A.LOGIN_ID , A.HUMAN_ID , B.NAME, B.USER_GROUP_ID FROM WORK_USER A, INFO_HUMAN B WHERE A.LOGIN_ID = #{mem_id} AND A.LOGIN_PW = #{password} AND A.HUMAN_ID = B.HUMAN_ID

SELECT COFFEE_NAME as COFFEENAME , SHOT_YN as SHOTYN , CREAM_YN as CREAMYN , IMG , SALE_START_DATE as SALESTARTDATE , REMARK , SPRICE , MPRICE , LPRICE FROM TCOFFEEMENU WHERE
SALE_START_DATE < SYSDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCOFFEEMENU( COFFEE_NAME , SHOT_YN, CREAM_YN, IMG , SALE_START_DATE , REMARK , MODIFY_DATE , MODIFY_ID , INSERT_DATE , INSERT_ID , SPRICE , MPRICE , LPRICE ) VALUES( #{coffeeName} , #{shotYn} , #{creamYn} , #{image} , #{startdate} , #{remark} , sysdate , 'ch' , sysdate , 'ch' , #{sprice} , #{mprice} , #{lprice} )
mapper.select: SELECT COFFEE_NAME , COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TORDERHIS GROUP BY COFFEE_NAME
SELECT ID , CONTENTS , CORRECT FROM INFO_QUIZ
SELECT TA.TITLE , TA.WORK_DATE , TB.NAME , TB.USER_GROUP_ID FROM INFO_NOTICE_BOARD TA , INFO_HUMAN TB WHERE TA.MENU_GROUP_ID=#{menuGroupId} AND TA.REGIST_USER=TB.HUMAN_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INFO_NOTICE_BOARD( TITLE , CONTENTS , REGIST_DATE , REGIST_USER , WORK_USER , WORK_DATE , MENU_GROUP_ID , BOARD_NUM ) VALUES( #{title} , #{contents} , SYSDATE , '00000001' , '00000001' , SYSDATE , #{menuGroupId} , SQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL )
mapper.update: UPDATE INFO_NOTICE_BOARD SET CONTENTS = #{contents}, WORK_USER = #{workUser}, WORK_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MENU_GROUP_ID || BOARD_NUM = #{menuGroupId}#{boardNum}
